dict.acceptation: 盐；风趣；机智，讽刺；药用盐，泻盐；
撒盐；用盐渍；加盐以调味；为…增加趣味；
含盐的；有咸味的；盐渍的；

sent.orig: Pre-salt Sediment Group, Salt Sediment Group and Post-salt Sediment Group.
sent.trans: 在剖面上可分为三套地层组合，即盐下层系、含盐层系和盐上层系。

sent.orig: The forming models of hydrocarbon accumulation are different-salt, salt and supra-salt in the Kuqa depression.
sent.trans: 受盐相关构造变形影响，库车坳陷盐下、盐间和盐上存在三种不同的成藏模式。

sent.orig: Background of Project: there are three sources of industrial salts: salt, salt and well salt.
sent.trans: 项目背景及建设条件：工业盐的来源有三个途径：海盐湖盐和井盐。

sent.orig: Ningjing salt highways, highway salt Zonghuai, Ning salt roads throughout the township level.
sent.trans: 宁靖盐高速公路、盐淮高速公路、宁盐一级公路贯穿镇区。

sent.orig: Salt Threshold Value Measurements for Instruction Salt Restriction Diet in Patients witn Heart Diseases.
sent.trans: 测定盐阈指导心脏病病人合理限盐饮食。
